attributes.action: fill the so called employment skills gap by the British! and not cheap labour which will not last.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take away the obsticles and red tape and train the British to do British jobs.I don't believe that the British do not want to fill the so called gap in the skills market. I know from personal experiance that it is extremely hard for young people to gain experiance as employers are put off by the restrictions in health and safety and insurance etc, that apprentices/trainees are weighed down with.This could be part of reason that some British workers are not up to the task or work is dirty and shabby.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
